# Safety and Environmental Verification Services Bid Solicitation

## Solicitation Details
* Reference Number: PW-22-01009333 (amended PW-22-01009333)
* Solicitation Number: HX220017
* Publication Date: October 5, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2022, 14:00 (EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

## Contracting Entity and End User Information
* Contracting Entity: Defence Construction Canada
* Address: 350 Albert Street, 19th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada
* Contact Person: Camille Attia
* Email Address: [Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone Number: 613-715-0564

## Scope of Work and Evaluation Criteria
The contract for the provision of Safety and Environmental Verification Services will be awarded to the winning bidder based on the criteria specified in the document. Providers of these services must meet the security requirements outlined in the RFAP. 

## Key Contract Details
* Estimated Maximum Contract Value: $400,000 (potentially increasing to $2,000,000)
* Option to Extend Contract: The Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) may be extended twice with a maximum value of $400,000 per extension.

## Bid Submission Information
Bidders must submit their proposal through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time specified in the system.

## Notice URL and Attachments
None.

## Additional Information
For more information on the security requirements for this bid and to access contract award results, please visit the Defence Construction Canada website.
